definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Objective To prepare controlled porosity osmotic pump tablets of sodium salicylate.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備水楊酸鈉滲透泵控釋片。

sentences.english: Difluorobiphenyl is the key intermediate for the synthesis of antipyretic analgesic Diflunisal.
sentences.chinese: 二氟聯苯是合成消炎鎮痛藥氟苯水楊酸的關鍵中間體。

sentences.english: A skincare mask formulated specifically for people with acne is likely to include benzoyl peroxide or salicylic acid.
sentences.chinese: 有痘皮膚的面膜通常含有過氧化苯甲酰和水楊酸。

sentences.english: The result showed that papaya ringspot virus disease was effectively controlled by SA treatment.
sentences.chinese: 研究了水楊酸對番木瓜環斑病的防治效果。

sentences.english: Extra-fine salicylic acid crystallites were prepared by using crystal growth inhibitors such as polyethylene glycol and pentaerythritol.
sentences.chinese: 採用晶體生長抑制劑技術，製備了超細水楊酸晶體。

sentences.english: But salicylic acid is another no-no for pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 但是水楊酸對懷孕女性來說又是一個要說不的成份。

sentences.english: Benzotriazole, o - hydroxyl benzophenone, salicylic acid and esters comprise several important types of ultraviolet - absorbents(UAS).
sentences.chinese: 水楊酸酯類化合物構成了幾種重要類型的紫外吸收劑。

sentences.english: Manganese salicylate was synthesized with the rheological phase reaction method.
sentences.chinese: 用流變相反應法合成了水楊酸錳配合物。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo establish ratio spectrophotometry for determination of chloramphenicol and salicylic acid in tincture.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立氯柳酊中氯黴素和水楊酸的比值光譜測定法。

sentences.english: Strain Sphingomonas sp. GY2B degrade phenanthrene via salicylate pathway.
sentences.chinese: GY2B菌株對菲的降解可能通過水楊酸途徑。

sentences.english: The new method of determining saccharin sodium in beverages by sodium salicylate colorimetry is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了水楊酸鈉比色法測定飲料中糖精鈉的新方法。

sentences.english: The method for content determination of acetylsalicylic acid enteric-coated tablet was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探討小劑量乙酰水楊酸腸溶片的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: The method was used to determine salicylic acid in benzoic acid.
sentences.chinese: 該法巳用於樣品複方苯甲酸醇溶液中水楊酸的測定。

sentences.english: Effects of carboxylic media in the racemization of neutral amino acids catalyzed by salicylaldehyde were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 繼而研究了羧酸溶劑中水楊酸催化的中性氨基酸消旋。

sentences.english: Objective To study the action of pseudoephedrine salicylate on the central nervous system of mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解僞麻黃鹼水楊酸對小鼠中樞神經系統的作用。

sentences.english: Salicylic acid belongs to the group of medicines known as keratolytics.
sentences.chinese: 水楊酸屬於已知的角質層分離劑類藥物。
